name: The Glitchy Rush
description:
The Glitchy Rush is an endless runner in which you start a rush with a car, but when... a glitch occurs and who'll you become?

Explore different locations and epochs, from medieval ages to the nearest future, collect the gears and have fun!

The latest browser version here: https://gameof2021.blaybubbles.com

Controls:

Arrows LEFT and RIGHT to slide

Arrow UP to Jump
